message.body: Hey ####, its #####.. do you know what department or unit #####is in?
U can call him 267-######## if u have any question
I think so lol.. I don't know if patsy got around to telling you or him that I mentioned him as a friend for the police recruit program. It just asks what dept they are in so ill put 17th district
My husband actually knows the girls who runs the recruitment program
Really? That's awesome! I did the fitness exam a few weeks ago. Now tomorrow I go for the interview portion (psychological eval and polygraph exam)
